long_description: The large capacity of the INNO Shadow 18 cargo roof box holds enough gear for outings with the whole family or a group of friends, and is easy to load thanks to the single-handed, dual-side opening. Universal mounting hardware mounts to square, round and most factory crossbars. 18 cu. ft. capacity accommodates up to 8 pairs of skis or 6 snowboards. Durable, lightweight 3-layer ABS construction; stiff bottom offers strength and durability. Includes locks and keys; gloss black finish.
short_description: The large capacity of the INNO Shadow 18 cargo roof box holds enough gear for outings with the whole family or a group of friends, and is easy to load thanks to the single-handed, dual-side opening.
